author: Thomas Goetz
title: A Lot of People Don't Even *Know* They Should Stay Home
description: A new survey finds that a startling proportion of Americans remain confused or misinformed about the local public-health advice.
content: Note that stay-at-home orders have been a moving target, with five states still under no order and three states under partial orders, as of 5pm ET on Tuesday, and this survey took place during a period when many states enacted their order at different times. … [+3292 chars]
